law.catch_line: One-way roadways, parking on left side.

text.section:
Sec. 30-388.19. One-way roadways, parking on left side.
In the event a street includes two (2) or more separate roadways and traffic is restricted to one (1) direction upon any such roadway, no person shall stand or park a vehicle upon the left-hand side of such one-way roadway unless signs are erected to permit such standing or parking.
